meanings.definition: An account of a person's life written by that person.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed reading my autobiography to my family.
meanings.sent2: Her autobiography was filled with interesting stories from her childhood.
meanings.sent3: My autobiography made my friends laugh at all the silly things I did.
meanings.sent4: Her autobiography was a mirror reflecting her journey through life.
meanings.sent5: The autobiography painted a vivid picture of the author's experiences.

meanings.definition: The story of a person's life written by that person.
meanings.sent1: Writing an autobiography can help you understand your own life better.
meanings.sent2: His autobiography detailed his struggles and triumphs over the years.
meanings.sent3: The autobiography was so engaging that I couldn't put it down.
meanings.sent4: Her autobiography was a treasure trove of memories and emotions.
meanings.sent5: Reading the autobiography felt like stepping into the author's shoes.
